title: Kerala's AI Literacy Revolution: 'Sarvam AI Mayam' Empowers Adults

title: State approves ₹22L for AI infra in higher and technical education

title: India's AI Revolution: Powering Productivity and Redefining Roles
description: Artificial Intelligence AI in India is expected to boost productivity and facilitate role redesigns in the near future with a focus on maintaining employment Experts emphasize adopting a sovereign by design strategy ensuring India retains control over its data and capabilities while remaining globally integrated
